name: Daniel J. SCHATZ in his capacity as Environmental Advocate v. COASTAL RESOURCES MANAGEMENT COUNCIL et al.
name_abbreviation: Schatz v. Coastal Resources Management Council

parties: Daniel J. SCHATZ in his capacity as Environmental Advocate v. COASTAL RESOURCES MANAGEMENT COUNCIL et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts, II, Atty. Gen., Daniel J. Schatz, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., for petitioner.
Tillinghast, Collins & Graham, Peter V. Lacouture, Providence, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
Daniel J. SCHATZ in his capacity as Environmental Advocate v. COASTAL RESOURCES MANAGEMENT COUNCIL et al.
No. 82-87-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 11, 1982.
Dennis J. Roberts, II, Atty. Gen., Daniel J. Schatz, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., for petitioner.
Tillinghast, Collins & Graham, Peter V. Lacouture, Providence, for respondents.
